about_the_game:
Meng mi (116) is a first person plot oriented horror game. Players need to collect key items and think about puzzles to promote the development of the plot. The game integrates many kinds of terrorist elements such as chasing, avoiding, corner killing, and supports the double ending mechanism.


Game features:
Novel decryption techniques
Strong sense of sound effect substitution
Large activity space
Terror effect full
Double outcome mechanism

short_description: The player will play a person who survived the car accident, walking alone on the road, exploring in the dark forest, looking for the truth in the strange town, whether he really survived and walked out of the darkness in his heart is up to the player............
